title: New skin for Hecarim!
body: So  tought up on this new skin for Hecarim which i think that would be really cool and many players would like to see it. Skin title is "Hot Rod Hecarim" and in it Hecarim wouldn't be half horse anymore, instead he would drive and badas Hog Motorcycle, and instead of his normal weapon he would carry something like Firefighter Axe or even a Baseball Bat. His head could heave his classical color or it would be changed into red fire-ish color (Would be like Ghost Rider too much tough) or he could even heave some helmet on his head. I leave rest of his desing to you, dear Rito (I tought of something like a black jacket). I think that many players would like to see this skin beacuse it would be so damn cool and awesome. Please make it happen (You would make a normal LoL player happy {{champion:32}} )
